briefTitle: BIOPSY SCANNER LLTECH© Technology for Diagnosis of Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Performance Study of BIOPSY SCANNER LLTECH© Technology in the Immediate Diagnosis of Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients over 18 years old requiring a breast biopsy for an birads 4 or 5 nodular radiological lesion or lymph node for a lymph node judged to be radiologically suspect (cortex thickened by more than 3 mm)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients under 18
